title: Implement login screen
description: As a user, I want to log into the platform so that I can access my personal tasks and project information.

title: User session persistence
description: As a user, I want my session to persist so that I do not need to log in every time I refresh or reopen the app.

title: Dashboard layout
description: As a user, I want a dashboard that organizes tasks visually so that I can quickly understand progress and workload distribution.

title: Add theme switcher
description: As a user, I want to switch between light and dark mode so that I can use the interface comfortably based on my environment.

title: Create task modal
description: As a user, I want to create new tasks in a modal window so that I can input task details without leaving the board.

title: Implement drag & drop
description: As a user, I want to move tasks between columns using drag and drop interactions so that I can update task progress naturally.

title: Add global error handler
description: As a user, I want clear error messages during failures so that I can understand when something went wrong.

title: Implement user avatar
description: As a user, I want my avatar or initials shown so that I can visually identify assigned tasks throughout the board.

title: UX polishing
description: As a user, I want improved spacing and layout so that the interface feels cleaner and easier to digest.

title: Introduce loading states
description: As a user, I want to see loading indicators so that I know when the system is processing data.

title: API documentation
description: As a developer, I want Swagger documentation so that I can understand and test the API endpoints easily.

title: Accessibility review
description: As a user, I want an accessible interface so that users with disabilities can navigate and interact with the platform.

title: Refactor board into components
description: As a developer, I want the board broken into reusable components so that the codebase is more maintainable and scalable.

title: Add card hover animation
description: As a user, I want hover animations so that interactions feel more responsive and visually appealing.

title: Integration test basic flow
description: As a QA engineer, I want automated integration tests so that the main user flows are regularly validated.

title: JWT expiration check
description: As a user, I want to be automatically logged out when my token expires so that my account stays secure.

title: Keyboard shortcuts
description: As a power user, I want keyboard shortcuts so that I can manage tasks faster and more efficiently.

title: Context menu
description: As a user, I want right-click options so that I can quickly perform actions on tasks without additional clicks.

title: Board auto refresh
description: As a user, I want the board to refresh automatically so that I always see the latest task states.

title: Dark mode contrast improvements
description: As a user, I want better contrast in dark mode so that elements are clearly visible at all times.

title: Add archived column
description: As a user, I want to archive tasks so that I can remove completed items without permanently deleting them.

title: Add search bar
description: As a user, I want to search tasks by title or assignee so that I can quickly find relevant work.

title: Add filters
description: As a user, I want to filter tasks by status or assignee so that I can focus on what matters most.

title: Add app intro tour
description: As a new user, I want a guided tour so that I can understand how the platform works without guessing.

title: Add success animations
description: As a user, I want visual celebrations for completed tasks so that progress feels rewarding.

title: Cypress test setup
description: As a QA engineer, I want a configured E2E testing environment so that features can be validated automatically.

title: Hot module reload issues
description: As a developer, I want HMR working properly so that development speed is increased and page reloads are avoided.

title: Add roadmap page
description: As a stakeholder, I want a roadmap page so that I can track planned product features.

title: Clean unused dependencies
description: As a developer, I want to remove unused libraries so that the project stays clean and lightweight.

title: Upgrade React version
description: As a developer, I want the latest React version so that the project benefits from performance improvements and new features.
